name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Ruby on Rails**, APIs, and third-party integrations to deliver high-performance chat-driven experiences. Proven ability to design and implement security by design principles, ensuring compliance with industry standards. Adept at cross-functional collaboration and technical strategy, with extensive background in conducting code reviews and providing mentorship to junior developers.

Skilled in both frontend and backend development utilizing a wide range of technologies, including **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in deploying cloud-native systems across **AWS** and **Azure** environments and implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Demonstrated expertise in building AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing while ensuring robust compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong MLOps background, proficient in model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
